summary: A man who loses a very personal part of his body to cancer decides he wants it back in this offbeat black comedy.
cast: Wotan Wilke Möhring|Julia Hummer|Antoine Monot Jr.|Alexander Beyer|Janek Rieke|Doris Schretzmayer|Götz Schubert|Fatih Cevikkollu|Marie Gruber|Thomas Thieme|Leander Haußmann|Mirko Borscht|Jürgen Brandschedel|Claudia Bratfisch|Victor Calero|Romanus Fuhrmann|Franziska Hayner|Jasmin Köhler|David Lindner Leporda|Wolfgang Michael|Gisela Monot|Steffen Münster|Thomas Pötzsch|Christiane Scheda|Andreas Schmidt|Robert Schupp|Gernot Sprenger|Victoria Voss
title: Las joyas de la familia
